name: GMG Advertising
description:
Gorilla Marketing Group /dba GMG Advertising,  is an advertising/marketing agency located in Miami, FL. The purpose of GMG in the world of advertising is to help prospective clients reach their full potential, whether it has to do with Media placement, Corporate Branding, Web Development, Web Marketing & Optimization, Public Relations, or Social Media.
 GMG’s professional and passionate workforce has embodied a great relationship with past and present clients, making sure that their client’s message is reflective of the services and products that clients want to offer.
